attributes.action: grant  Medical Herbalism practitioners statutory registration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statutory regulation will ensure high standards of training and practice within the profession. Maintained High standards and quality control of herbal medicines. Continual professional development of said practitioners. Ability of those practitioners to liase  more easily with other health professionals in the interest of the patient.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "grant Medical Herbalism practitioners statutory registration."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21823


Prime Minister's Office
